Subskills.name: Explosive Outburst
Subskills.description: Increases the explosion area of effect radius of exploding bolas.

Subskills.name: Improved Design
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by exploding bolas.

Subskills.name: Loaded Charge
Subskills.description: Bolas are stuck on enemies for a longer period of time, dealing damage to them during this period causes the explosion to gain increased damage & size up to 5 times.

Subskills.name: Multibolas
Subskills.description: Throw multiple bolas in an arc.

Subskills.name: Low Blow
Subskills.description: Bolas have a chance on hit to stun the enemy.

Subskills.name: Another One
Subskills.description: Chance for bolas to explode an additional time.

Subskills.name: Bola'd Stasis
Subskills.description: Bola now grabs all enemies on its path and pulls nearby enemies towards it when hitting terrain.

Subskills.name: Tough Fall
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Speedslinger
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using exploding bolas.

Subskills.name: Longer Ropes
Subskills.description: Bolas now pierce allowing them to attach to multiple targets dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Clusterducks
Subskills.description: Throw multiple explosive rubberducks that bounce towards a nearby target before exploding.

Subskills.name: Magnetic String
Subskills.description: Monsters caught by bolas are pulled towards the first target.
